metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25706 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in templates_import.php(Cacti 1.2.13) due to Improper escaping of error message during templateimport preview in the xml_path field

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25706` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.2.16+ds1-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.16+ds1-2ubuntu1').
